title: Load Up On These Beaten-Up Cryptos: Waves, Celo, Quitriam Finance - Outlook India

description: This article argues that some of these cryptos have been unfairly oversold by investors, with some promising projects now trading at more attractive valuations. This is an opportunity to load up on these cryptos while theyâ€™re still cheap, and reap the benefits over the coming years.
